action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign in the middle of the top of the image. To the left and right of the plus sign are two green vertical rectangles. Below the plus sign are two orange shapes, one is a backwards L shape and the other is a shape that looks like a backwards L with a square on top. To the right of the image are two pink shapes, one is a rectangle with a square on top and the other is a rectangle with a square on the bottom.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "L" shape, a pink "P" shape, a green "T" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form a word.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign in the middle of the top of the image. To the left and right of the plus sign are two green vertical rectangles. Below the plus sign are two orange shapes, one is a backwards L shape and the other is a shape that looks like a backwards L with a square on top. To the right of the image are two pink shapes, one is a rectangle with a square on top and the other is a rectangle with a square on the bottom.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are the two orange shapes connected to each other?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "L" shape, a pink "P" shape, a green "T" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form a word.
QUESTION: Are the two orange shapes connected to each other? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the pink "P" shape to the right of the green "L" shape?

ANSWER: Yes.
QUESTION: Is the pink "P" shape to the right of the green "L" shape? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Yes.
